feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Standard apps add custom button in public cloud
entry.content:
Hello Team,
I’m working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, and I have a requirement to add a custom action button to a standard Fiori application. As we know, direct modification of standard apps is restricted in the public cloud.
Can anyone guide me on the possible extensibility options to achieve this?
Is there any supported way to add a custom button using Developer Extensibility or any?
If not directly possible, is there any standard app developed using RAP BO (Restful ABAP Programming Model) that supports custom action extensions?
Ideally, I want to add some custom button and logic behind that button.

entry.title: Custom logic for checking journal entry submitter against approvers
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

We have a business case

Multiple level Approval for Verify Journal Entry - number of workflow are pre-defined with 5 level base on amount

1. Level_1 <5,000 USD

.Approver 1 :  with userid A

.Approver 2 :  with userid B

2. Level_2 : > 5,001 & < 20,000 USD

Approver 1 :  with userid C

Approver 2 :  with userid D

3. Level_3 : > 20,001 & <200,000 USD

Approver 1 :  with userid E

4. Level_4 : > 200,001 & <500,000 USD

Approver 1 :  with userid F

5. Level_5 : > 500,001 USD

Approver 1 :  with userid G

All approvers are stored on this CDS:  I_RESPYMGMTTEAMMEMBERAPI

Journal Entry - Verify by Requester:

  • CDS VIEW name: C_GLJRNLENTRYTOBEVERIFIED
  • CDS field name: PARKEDBYUSER

which custom logic that can perform checking submitter [PARKEDBYUSER] against approver on CDS view I_RESPYMGMTTEAMMEMBERAPI

and if PARKEDBYUSER is found on which level then that approval level is kept and go to next level.

is it this one?

* Business Context: Journal Entry Verification in General Ledger
* BAdI Description: Value evaluation of additional conditions for scenarios

SCENARIO_ID = WS02800046

if yes, please guide the logic for keep the approval level and go next level

Patrickc

entry.title: Add a custom field in manage teams and responsibilities definition
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am trying to create a Flexible workflow for sales credit memo requests. For that, I am trying to assign a custom field(approval reason id) to manage teams and responsibility. I have added that in the FIORI app but I am unable to do the same in the config step named "Assign Custom Responsibility Definition to CDS View". I am getting the following error: " For unreleased CDS views in SAP namespace, only custom fields are allowed". I believe because of this error I am not able to successfully complete the steps.

I'm not sure which process i need to follow if you are aware of any solution could you please let me know.

I need a custom responsibility definition under responsibility section while creating  team. 

I followed  below articles but still not able to find the exact solution.

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/a630d57fc5004c6383e7a81efee7a8bb/30fa795560884d96812e937cd90f6165.html

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/a630d57fc5004c6383e7a81efee7a8bb/aca8c2682d284f2185873b14f838f7eb.html

Best Regards,

Naga

entry.title: My Inbox App customizing
entry.content:
Hi all, 

I wonder if it is possible to customize the My Inbox App so that the "Texts" available in the Credit Memo Request Form could be displayed in My Inbox 

For Purchase Orders the fields "Notes" are displayed in My Inbox, which is very usefull for the approver who are able to read comments are internal notes related to the order. This can help them to make a decision about whether accepting or rejecting the order (see attachement "my_inbow_purchase_order_notes") 

But, despite similar fields "Texts" exist in the Credit Memo Request form (see attachement "credit_memo_request_form"), they are not displayed in My Inbox (see attachement "my_inbow_credit_memo_request") 

 

 

Would someone know if it is possible to customize My Inbox App template – in a 2Sl s4 hana public cloud system – so that the "Texts" filds could be displayed in the credit memo request approval view ?

Or if there  is an "easy way" to create a custom field in the Credit Memo Request Template and display it in My Inbox ? 

Thank you for your help, 

Erwan

entry.title: S/4 Hana Extensibility Service Instance
entry.content:
I have an application on SAP BTP. The application has few service bindings. For example : application-x has eleven bindings. Ten of them are of type s4-hana-cloud and one of them is xsuaa. I do understand that why we have binded xsuaa but I don't understand the use case of s4-hana-cloud bindings. 

Why do we need instance of s4-hana-cloud ? Also, I want to learn side by side extension development. Is there a good tutorial that outlines step by step guide? I want to use Cloud SDK for typescript code generation and then call some API from SAP Business Acclerator Hub. I understand few things. For example : Downloading edmx, then use cloud SDK to generate code and use that code on my service, creating destination. But I don't know how to put all these together. 

Help me with this. Thanks. Any paid course or resource is also highly appreciated. If you have question , then don't hesitate to ask.

entry.title: Sales Order repricing through api
entry.content:
We are using S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition and looking for ways to trigger repricing of an existing sales order. We are using standard integration with Vertex system for tax calculation and based on certain criteria, we want to recalculate taxes after a sales order is created. We checked OData v4 api for sales order but not sure if it supports such a repricing requirement. The requirement is similar to below feature of 'Update Price' available in classic SAPGUI application VA02.

Please let me know if it is possible through api or if it is in the roadmap, e.g., S/4HANA Cloud version 2508?

Best regards,

Sumit

entry.title: Spool generation in S/4 HANA Public cloud
entry.content:
Hi All,

We have created a RAP application and scheduled a background job for the same. We are able to generate logs by using standard class method ( DATA: application_log TYPE REF TO if_bali_log. ) but not able to generate spool as we use to do it via SAP GUI where we can access the spool through SP01 Tcode.

Please find the attached screenshot of the spool generated via SAP standard apps in public cloud.

The above is generated via Results option

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Custom Field Customer Invoice output
entry.content:
Hello, I need to have a custom field related to Long text in my customer invoice PDF output. I therefore created a CF with characters limit of 200. When I try to post a customer invoice in Create Outgoing Invoices app (FB70), the CF appears in the G/L line items section BUT only allows me to enter 30 characters. 

I tried to test it in different application like Create Supplier Invoice where the CF also appeared within the G/L line items BUT this time it allowed me to post up to 200... so I think there is a limitation in the FB70. 

Any ideas? 

Thank you

entry.title: How to use read_to_xml method when the rap is draft
entry.content:
Hi ,  sap  expert

  I am trying to develop  a  Adobe form in ABAP On Cloud (Embedded Steampunk),  i have referred to this blog : 

https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-sap/calling-custom-adobe-form-in-abap-on-cloud-embedded-steampunk/ba-p/13585170

 my question is , when  i  call this method DATA(lv_xml) = lo_fdp_util->read_to_xml( it_select = lt_keys ) . the program  will abap dump ,   my rap is use draft  ,  Do I need to do some other job before I can use this method?

 

 

Thank you.

entry.title: BADI MRM_CHECK_INVOICE_CLOUD implementation at Save as completed action is not getting called
entry.content:
I am in the learning phase of SAP Public Cloud development, I have implemented BADI MRM_CHECK_INVOICE_CLOUD at Save as completed action but the implementation is not getting called. The requirement is to trigger this badi when the supplier invoice amount is greater than the approver's limit.

#sap public cloud #sap public cloud ABAP programming

entry.title: MIGO BADI in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am looking for a BADI/Enhancement Spot during MIGO ( Standard App : Post Goods Receipt for Purchasing Document). I  know in SAP ECC we have BADI MB_DOCUMENT_BADI which can be leveraged to perform custom functionalities with method MB_DOCUMENT_UPDATE, but not able to find any such released BADI when working in SAP S/4 public cloud edition. 

I know there are some released BADI to check the data for header and line item data but didn't find any which triggers during/after posting the document. In short, I need to print a label once material document is created in the system.

Thank you in advance for the help.

entry.title: SAP ES版本中，通过哪个CDS或方法，可以找到销售价格主数据的条件记录号
entry.content:
SAP S4HANA CLOUD PUBLIC 版本中，通过CDS I_SlsPrcgConditionRecord可以找到条件记录号（condtionrecord）、金额（conditionratevalue)。但从哪个CDS或用哪种方法，可以找到销售价格主数据的条件记录号？

类似之前OP版本，可以从Axxx 表中找到相应的条件、条件记录号。

如下图，我想通过条件：销售组织1310、价格组B2、物料SG9100，如何才能找到条件记录号0000007421 ？

entry.title: SAP ES版本中，单位换算和汇率换算是否有提供公共类
entry.content:
场景：在修改工单分摊规则时，按需求，需要物料销售价格 VK12 和工单产出数量 计算每个产出物料的金额占比，以该占比更新工单分摊规则。

目前，VK12 的价格在 API 可查询，工单产出数量在 CDS  I_ManufacturingOrderItem 可查询，但是 I_ManufacturingOrderItem 不含 afpo.umrez 和 afpo.umren 字段，而工单产出数量的单位 可能和 销售价格的单位不一致，不同产出物的销售货币也可能不一致。需要将销售单价单位和产出数量单位转换为相同单位，将不同销售单价转换为相同货币，来计算各个产出物的金额占比。

所以需要  单位换算 和 汇率换算 相关的类或函数，类似 BAPI_EXCHANGERATE_GETDETAIL 和 MD_CONVERT_MATERIAL_UNIT 的功能，另外 VK12 的价格是否有相关 CDS 直接查询

entry.title: Badi FIN_ACDOC_ITEM_VALIDATION does not have necessary fields for Validation for manual payments
entry.content:
We are working on implementing a custom validation to ensure that during manual payments, house bank selected matches the house bank used in the reference vendor invoice selected for payment. But however House bank and Account ID of Invoice selected (Post Outgoing Payment APP) is not updating in the Vendor Line item. Please suggest any other BAdi available  or any workaround to help us validate the house bank details present in Invoice at the time of payment. 

We implemented an enhancement using BAdi FIN_ACDOC_ITEM_VALDATION.

BAdi code:

if  accountingdocheader-transactioncode = 'FBDC_C014' ."and accountingdocheader-accountingdocumenttype = 'KZ'.

CONSTANTS lc_message_class TYPE symsgid VALUE 'FIN_SUB_VAL'.

CLEAR validationmessage.

validationmessage-msgid = lc_message_class.

validationmessage-msgty = 'E'.

validationmessage-msgno = '010'.

validationmessage-msgv1 = '61003000'.

RETURN.

endif.

entry.title: Need to validate the Housebank of Invoices during manual payment in Post Outgoing Payments app
entry.content:
Hi All,

We are working on implementing a custom validation to ensure that during manual payments, house bank selected matches the house bank used in the reference vendor invoice selected for payment. 

To achieve this, we implemented a Custom Logic enhancement using BAdi FIN_ACDOC_ITEM_VALDATION.

This logic compares the house bank from the current journal entry line with one used in the reference invoice, using the standard CDS view I_JournalEntryItem

We need to block payments if the house bank/ account id used does not match the original invoice's house bank to prevent accounting mismatches.

Our requirement is:

  1. Is BAdi FIN_ACDOC_ITEM_VALDATION triggered during manual payments posted via the Post Outgoing Payments App?
  2. If not triggered, is there an alternate enhancement point that support this validation.
  3. What is the recommended way to validate or restrict the house bank used in manual payments with reference to invoice data in Public cloud?

Thanks & Regards,

entry.title: MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_HEADER not triggered during Automatic Creation of PO from PR.
entry.content:
Currently I_PURCHASEORDEREMAILPARAMETER is not extensible so MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_HEADER is used to update custom fields in PO email template. This is working fine during creation/update of PO however MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_HEADER is not triggered during Automatic Creation of PO from PR.

How can you update custom fields for PO email template during automatic PO creation from PR? 

PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_ITEM and MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_ITEM were checked however custom field cannot be used for email template.

entry.title: I_JournalEntryItem”无法在Customer Data Browser”里显示问题-如何在公有云中能看到Journal Entry Line Item的data？
entry.content:
I_JournalEntryItem”无法在Customer Data Browser”里显示问题-如何在公有云中能看到Journal Entry Line Item的data？

When checking app Customer Data Browser, we want to display all finance data (ACDOCA) in cds views. According to hub https://api.sap.com/cdsviews/I_JOURNALENTRYITEM, the cds view should be I_JournalEntryItem (Basic).

However, in app “Customer Data Browser”, we cannot find this cds views

How can we see the journal entry item cds view directly in cloud system? (same as checking ACDOCA in OP)

We also tried to go to “Custom CDS Views”, and created a  YY1_JEItem cds view with the “I_JournalEntryItem” as primary data source. But we can only pick the fields one by one. This is not what we want. We want to directly check the journal entry line item data in public cloud, just like we can check the data of the header system.

 

Besides, we also found the cds view: I_ACCOUNTINGDOCUMENTJOURNAL. But we see that the amount of fields are not the same. Not sure if we can use this one though.

entry.title: Need Help Mapping Tax Entries to Supplier Invoice Items–Issue in Developing Purchase Register Report
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

We are in the process of developing a custom Purchase Register report in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, and are encountering several challenges in retrieving accurate tax information at the invoice item level. Despite leveraging standard CDS views, we are unable to establish a reliable linkage between tax entries and their corresponding document items—which is critical for our reporting requirements.

Purpose of the Requirement
The goal is to build a Purchase Register report that provides a consolidated view of:

  • Supplier invoice line items

  • Tax amounts (eligible and ineligible)

  • Freight and asset item taxes

  • Proper item-wise tax segregation and traceability

This report is essential for GST compliance, input tax credit (ITC) auditability, and monthly financial reporting. However, the current limitations in CDS views are hindering this development.

Key Issues Faced

Case 1: Ineligible Tax – Missing Item-Level Field

  • No dedicated item-level field exists for capturing ineligible tax amounts.

  • The available tax CDS views do not return these tax entries, making it difficult to retrieve or calculate the correct tax per invoice item.

Case 2: Freight as a Separate Line Item

  • When freight is posted separately, the tax CDS views do not clearly map the freight tax to the original invoice item.

  • Since both the invoice and freight line may share the same item number, it's impossible to distinguish the tax details per line.

Case 4 & 5: Asset Item – Tax Posting Per Quantity

  • For asset purchases, tax is posted per quantity (e.g., 3 units = 3 tax lines).

  • This leads to a mismatch between item numbers of the invoice and the tax entries.

  • As a result, we cannot reliably link each tax entry to the correct item in the billing document, breaking traceability and affecting report accuracy.

CDS Views Evaluated

We have tried the following:

  • I_OperationalAcctgDocItem
    Used to retrieve item-level data for supplier invoices, but lacks direct tax linkage.

  • I_SupplierInvoiceTaxAPI01
    Evaluated, but it does not provide the expected item-level breakdown or association to the correct invoice lines.

Help Needed From Community

We are looking for your expert suggestions on:

  • Any alternate CDS views that offer more granular linkage between invoice item and tax lines.

  • Recommended approaches or best practices to model or join tax data effectively for such scenarios.

  • Relevant SAP Notes, documentation, or workarounds followed in Public Cloud environments.

Any support, guidance, or shared experiences would be greatly appreciated to help us unblock this critical development.

Thank you in advance!

Kind regards,
Tasneem Ahmad Karimi

Let me know if you'd like a version with your company name, SAP tenant ID, or further formatting.
